###### **NEW UPDATE**

ZE ERUPTION ESCAPE 

Map Made By *Biohazard* / Team Frag Of Generation

-3 difficulties-

*NORMAL*
*HARD*
*XTREM*
*RANDOM*

-Thanks To- 

*Hannibal[SPA] for nazgul model
*Aeris for help*
*Kaemon for  help*
*Eddies for Special Models
*Rafuron blog for help*
*GAMEBANANA for other model*


-Tested by Frag Of Generation Community-

*Biohazard[Fog]*
*Osmos[Fog]*
*Sinik[Fog]*
*Pâte à crépe[Fog]*
*Dark[Fog]


-This Map Requires Noblock-

* 64 players max
* 4 different difficulties
* 1 Boss
* randomised medkits 
* random weapons
* 3 random Radio
* particles
* 3 Specials weapons **USE WEAPONS WITH "USE / E"**
* Full compiled (with HDR)
	
You are NOT allowed to edit and/or reupload the map!

Contact me for bug or others informations : fog.biohazard@gmail.com

www.fog.asso.fr FOR MORE INFO ON MY TEAM


v4 >>> v4_2

-ALL bug fixed
-nazgul remake
-optimized
-special weapons for zombie
